page.title: 09CHARLBURY SCHOOL
page.content: Charlbury School is separated into two buildings,the Infants at Crawborough and the Juniors by the Playing Close.There are 264 children,9 teachers including the Headteacher,2 helpers,5 dinner helpers,5 cooks,a caretaker,a secretary and a cleaner. A new school is planned for 1987 on the Crawborough site which will house all the children.The school uniform is mainly grey and red but we don't have to wear it.In my class there are 35 children.The school day starts at 8.55 and ends at 3.15,we have 3 breaks in that time.Children come to this school from the nearby villages of Fawler, Spelsbury,Dean and Taston. We have a football team and a netball team. We raise extra money by holding fetes 50/50 auctions,bingo and,occasionally, discos.
